reference_image_path_and_text_pairs: A front view portrait of Sarah.

The scene is set inside a lamp room at night. A woman, identifiable as in her late 40s with short brown hair and wearing loose-fitting clothes, is centrally framed, positioned in front of a large lamp. The lamp stands behind her. The room is dimly lit. Rain streaks across the glass of the windows. A medium-sized, scruffy mixed-breed dog stands near the woman.
text_prompt: Create a scene inside the lamp room. The lamp mechanism dominates the center of the frame. A middle-aged woman (short brown hair, wearing loose-fitting clothes) on the left is stabilizing the lamp. Her appearance should reference Image 0. Beside the woman is a medium-sized, scruffy mixed-breed dog. The dog's appearance should reference Image 3. The beam from the lamp is shining brightly. The scene setting should reference Image 6.
